node.title: Did Anyone Win the Powerball Jackpot on 12/8/21? Numbers and Results
node.alt: Powerball and Mega Millions lottery tickets displayed on January 3, 2018 in San Anselmo, California.
node.description: Three lucky players each bagged $100,000. But did anyone win the top prize in last night's game?
node.content:
["The Wednesday Powerball lottery drawing, offering a $291 million prize, with a cash value option of $213 million, took place last night.", "The winning numbers for December 8, 2021, were 3, 7, 33, 50 and 69, while the Powerball was 24 and the Power Play was 2x.", "The latest drawing saw no winners of the jackpot or the second prize, valued at $1 million. Had there been any second prize winners who purchased the Power Play option for $1, their second prize would have been worth $2 million.", "But 10 lucky ticket holders did match four white balls plus the Powerball, earning them each $50,000. Three of these players opted for the Power Play, earning them a prize of $100,000.", "There were 343 players who correctly guessed four white balls without the Powerball, each winning $100, with 90 of them having opted for Power Play, earning them each $200.", "A group of 796 players matched three white balls plus the Powerball, winning them each $100, while 217 of them purchased the Power Play option, raising their winnings to $200.", "The next drawing will be on Sunday, December 12, with an estimated jackpot of $307 million and a cash value of $224.7 million.", "
How to Play Powerball
", "Powerball tickets, which cost $2 per play, are sold in 45 states, Washington, D.C., Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.", "Ticket holders each select five numbers from one to 69 for the five white balls and a number from one to 26 for the Powerball.", "Players can multiply non-jackpot prizes by two, three, four, five or 10 times by purchasing the Power Play option for an additional $1 per play.", "Drawings take place every Wednesday and Saturday from the Florida Lottery draw studio in Tallahassee.", "
The Prizes
", "\"There are nine ways to win a prize in Powerball. All prizes are set cash amounts, except the Grand Prize. In California, prize payout amounts are pari-mutuel and determined by sales and the number of winners,\" the Powerball website explains.", "The Powerball jackpot prize value continues to grow until it's won. \"The Match 5 + Power Play prize value is always $2 million, while the 10X multiplier is only in play when the advertised jackpot is $150 million or less,\" according to the website.", "Jackpot winners can receive their prize as either an annuity or a lump-sum payment. For those who choose the annuity option, the winner is guaranteed to receive 30 graduated payments over 29 years. The annual payments increase by 5 percent until the 30th and final payment, the website notes.", "
What Are the Odds of Winning?
", "The overall odds of winning a prize are one in 24.9 and the winning odds are the same in every Powerball drawing, according to the Powerball website.", "\"Even if there are more tickets sold in a particular drawing, your odds of winning a prize are the same,\" the website states.", "", "
Powerball and Mega Millions lottery tickets displayed on January 3, 2018 in San Anselmo, California.
"]
